Today in Pembrokeshire, it's a solid 6 ft @10s WSW with a fresh 11 mph S wind. Expect clean conditions at spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay, especially during the mid-tide push. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @10s SW with light 2 mph SE winds, making it a quieter day. By the day after, we see a bit of a comeback with 4 ft @8s WSW and moderate 7 mph S winds, keeping it fun at various beaches. Best: today.
